channel.title: Bot on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Bot on Arrans github.io

item.title: gummipunkt/signalcow
item.description: This project provides a web-based platform to manage and interact with a Signal bot. It allows users to register, create groups that correspond to Signal groups, and configure webhooks to send messages to these groups via a REST API.

item.title: PangoraWeb/remindme-bot
item.description: A pangora/lemmy/kbin bot that reminds you after an amount of time

item.title: arran4/discord-rss-cron
item.description: Very basic cron job discord bot for publishing the latest entry in an rss feed.
